Row.Text: A set of misinterpreted orders has led a unit of our cavalry to charge through a valley full of enemy guns. Our cavalry is now respected worldwide, however, our officers are not.[NEWLINE]
We should invest in our brave mounted soldiers.
We need to improve our officer corps.
This proves Cavalry are a thing of the past.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a Military Academy in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All current Mounted Units are upgraded into Landships[ENDCOLOR]
We have invested in our mounted soldiers.
We have invested in our officer corps.
We have conceded that mounted warfare is obsolete.
A regiment of British Cavalry soldiers have charged heroically into a valley full of enemy guns.

Yet another Judilee celebration has stirred the hearts of our subjects! They rejoice throughout the land for the continuation of our long reign, and pray for many more to come. God save the Queen![NEWLINE]
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 10 turns[ENDCOLOR]
We have celebrated a Jubilee in honour of our long-reign.
Victoria is celebrating her Jubilee year as sovereign of Great Britain.
